[Page Title: Chinese Restaurant, MT.PLEASANT,SC, Online Order, Dine In, Take Out, Online Coupon,Discount Menu, customer Review]

China East Restaurant, Mt.Pleasant, SC
Welcome To our restaurant. Located at 920 Houston Northcutt Blvd, A5, Mt. Pleasant, SC 29464, our restaurant offers a wide array of authentic Asian dishes, ranging from traditional Chinese dishes such as Chicken with Mushroom, Moo Goo Gai Pan and Shrimp Fried Rice to new style entrees such as Shrimp Roll, Asian Style House Special Soup..
     Try our food and service today. Come in for a Chinese Lunch Special or during evenings for a delicious Szechuan or Hunan style dinner. You can also online order your favorite Chinese food for take out or delivery. .
     If you have any suggestion to our our food or service, please go to the Customer Feedback page and leave us your suggestion or review. We will respond to your suggestion as soon as possible. 
 Our goal at China East Restaurant, Mt. Pleasant, SC is to provide an unforgettable dining experience for all our patrons.
